biotools.summary: This package contains functions for removing batch effects and other unwanted variation in high-throughput experiments. It contains functions for identifying and building surrogate variables for high-dimensional data sets, which are covariates constructed directly from high-dimensional data (like gene expression/RNA sequencing/methylation/brain imaging data) that can be used in subsequent analyses to adjust for unknown, unmodeled, or latent sources of noise.

bioschemas.name: sva
